doc.field: - [Morgan Guaranty Australia Ltd] said it is expanding its 200 mln U.S. Dlr Euro-commercial paper program to include Australian dollar issues. The proportion of the facility to be issued in Australian dollar paper will depend on investor demand, but the total outstanding value will still not exceed 200 mln U.S. Dlrs. Morgan Guaranty Ltd's Hong Kong office will act as dealer for the Australian dollar issues. Under the program, notes in denominations of one mln dlrs will be issued, with maturities ranging from seven days to one year.
